endpoints.description: A comma-separated list of Kafka Connect REST endpoint(s), including the protocol (either `http` or `https`)
endpoints.title: Kafka Connect Endpoints

secret-user.description: The credentials to connect to Kafka Connect. The secret contains [username,password].
secret-user.title: Credentials Secret Name

secret-tls.description: The name of the TLS secret to use. Leaving this empty will configure a client with TLS disabled. The secret contains [tls,tls-ca].
secret-tls.title: TLS Secret Name

description: The schema for the provider side of the `connect_client` interface.
title: ProviderSchema
